section.p: A darkening of the heavens heralds the gathering storm. A ferocious wind sweeps the rain in sheets over your ship, and the waves rise and fall inexorably, lifting you up, and then dashing you down.

p.if: If you have a blessing of Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm. Cross off your blessing and .
